data.name: Pry Into The Void Demo
data.detailed_description:
Note: This game is still in development and will be seeking funding via Kickstarter, February 8th 2022.

Pry into the hearts of monsters and people in this bleak monster-taming RPG. What will you see in the people you love?

FREE DEMO AVAILABLE NOW.

Features:


  • A fun and challenging turn-based combat system where you build the perfect party composition and exploit enemy weaknesses, inspired by the Shin Megami Tensei series.
  • Unique monster-taming mechanics where you converse with the souls of monsters, making branching moral decisions visual-novel style. Many monsters for you to recruit!
  • A bleak and depraved story that will challenge the way you think about each character. Make choices to affect how you see these characters. Can you truly judge a person as binary good or evil.

Note: This game contains only mild horror elements with creepy imagery. This game contains no gore or jump scares.

This is the first entry to Project: Retched Garden, a collection of monster-taming RPGs where the flowers scream.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
